#BlackMagicCraft #Episode159 #YoumeetinaTAVERN

In this video I build a tavern diorama to photograph for an upcoming adventure module I cowrote with Quest Givers. Coming out soon!

In the meantime check out the Quest Givers Kickstarter: 
http://bit.ly/QG_NorthRoad

The templates and window plastic I used here are prototypes from the upcoming project between Shifting Lands and Tabletop Workshop: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iU0ReJvfxRk

For those curious about the big 200ml jars of Vallejo wash, you can actually buy them on Amazon. It's super cost effective vs the 17ml bottles.

Black

title: Building a 28mm Tavern Set Piece for Dungeons & Dragons
